#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
long long a[1000],n,c;
long long fastread()
{long long t=0;
char ch=getchar();
while(ch<33)
ch=getchar();
while(ch>33)
{t=t*10+ch-'0';
ch=getchar();
}
return t;
}
int main()
{
long long i,j,k,t,m,low,high,med,pos,x;
n=fastread();
c=fastread();
for(i=0;i<n;i++)
a[i]=fastread();
sort(a,a+n);
low=1;
high=a[0]*c;
while(low<=high)
{
    x=0;
med=(low+high)/2;
for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        x+=med/a[i];
    }
if(x>=c)
{
pos=med;
high=med-1;
}
else
low=med+1;
}
cout<<pos;
return 0;
}
